item.title: LetsEncrypt Certificates for Dockerized Nginx
item.description: I like nginx. I like docker. I like SSL. I also like not paying for SSL certificates. If you, like me are operating a small time website, you probably don’t want to dish out a few hundred dollars for an SSL certificate.Thankfully, LetsEncrypt provides free ssl certificates and is now trusted by most major browsers. However, integrating certbot to automatically configure my nginx inside a docker container has been a pain.
